sentence.Network_en: In the past, parents often believed that pain relief from antihistamines and decongestant's was necessary.
sentence.Network_cn: 过去, 家长往往认为,用抗组胺药和减充血剂来缓解疼痛是必要的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 去充血剂（Decongestant）这类药物能有效地消除因血管扩张所造成的鼻子不通，但是药物也会引起身体其它部位的血管收缩，因此 …
对控释的解充血药(decongestant)也评价了其在给药间期的效应,尤其是在给药间期的后几个小时。 但是常见的情况是,与血浆浓度相比,临床测量的效应是滞后的或者是.
(科学中药),由于疗效较差,需1-2天方可缓解症状,约需一周可以痊愈,比起西药之抗组织胺和去充血剂(decongestant),若不计较些微嗜睡和口乾舌燥之副作用,服用西药.
I saw an nose and throat physician who put me on prescription medication , including steroids and a strong decongestant .我去看了一个耳鼻喉医生，他给我开了一些药，包括类固醇和很强的消肿药。

list.abs: 专业词汇在线翻译、医学专业在线词典、双语例句 ... 鼻危象 nasal crisis 鼻减充血剂 nasal decongestant 鼻白喉 nasal diphtheria.
手术一般可于局部麻醉下进 ,较复杂的手术才须施全身麻醉.于进手术室前,可先使用血管收缩剂(nasal decongestant)喷入鼻腔作为初步黏膜收缩之用,并施予适的镇静剂(如valium或promethazine).入手术室后再以表面麻醉剂(如cocaine或xylocaine 加bosmine)
鼻充血减轻剂(Nasal Decongestants) 喷嚏(Sneezing) 致癌细胞(Oncocytes) 苍白(Pallor) 社会环境(Social Environment) 分类号  R765.
antacid tablets 解酸药片治胃痛decongestant spray 鼻塞喷剂nasal spray 鼻塞喷剂

entry.def: A decongestant is a medicine which helps someone who has a cold to breathe more easily.

means.word_mean: 1. a drug that decreases pulmonary congestion

auth_sentence.content: Treat nasal congestion using vapour rubs or taking decongestant drugs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Treat nasal congestion using vapour rubs or taking decongestant drugs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Treat nasal congestion using vapour rubs or taking decongestant drugs.

auth_sentence.content: Clenbuterol, similar to the asthma drug salbutamol, is used to treat breathing disorders as a decongestant and bronchodilator.
auth_sentence.res_content: Clenbuterol, similar to the asthma drug salbutamol, is used to treat breathing disorders as a decongestant and bronchodilator.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clenbuterol, similar to the asthma drug salbutamol, is used to treat breathing disorders as a decongestant and bronchodilator.
